feed.title: CVMI
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 08] Congratulations! Jun-Hyeok and Young-Woo, 1st Place Winner of the 대구시 공공데이터 활용 창업 경진대회. [Link]
entry.summary: [2024. 08] Congratulations! Jun-Hyeok and Young-Woo, 1st Place Winner of the 대구시 공공데이터 활용 창업 경진대회. [Link]

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 07] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “ESC-ZSAR: Expanded Semantics from Categories with Cross-Attention for Zero-Shot Action Recognition,” has been accepted in Expert Systems With Applications (SCI, JCR-IF: 7.5, Top 5.2%).
entry.summary: [2024. 07] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “ESC-ZSAR: Expanded Semantics from Categories with Cross-Attention for Zero-Shot Action Recognition,” has been accepted in Expert Systems With Applications (SCI, JCR-IF: 7.5, Top 5.2%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 07] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Enhancing Clustering Representations with Positive Proximity and Cluster Dispersion Learning,” has been accepted in Information Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.1, 13/156, Top 7.9%).
entry.summary: [2024. 07] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Enhancing Clustering Representations with Positive Proximity and Cluster Dispersion Learning,” has been accepted in Information Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.1, 13/156, Top 7.9%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 05] Congratulations! Won-Jun, and Seungyeon’s paper, “Integrating Query-aware Segmentation and Cross-Attention for Robust VQA,” has been accepted in CVPRW 2024.
entry.summary: [2024. 05] Congratulations! Won-Jun, and Seungyeon’s paper, “Integrating Query-aware Segmentation and Cross-Attention for Robust VQA,” has been accepted in CVPRW 2024.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 05] Congratulations! 3rd Place Winner of VizWiz VQA Grand Challenge in CVPR 2024.
entry.summary: [2024. 05] Congratulations! 3rd Place Winner of VizWiz VQA Grand Challenge in CVPR 2024.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 05] Congratulations! Doyoung’s paper, “객체 판단을 위한 레이더 및 영상관측장비의 연계 방안 연구” has been accepted in KIECS 2024.
entry.summary: [2024. 05] Congratulations! Doyoung’s paper, “객체 판단을 위한 레이더 및 영상관측장비의 연계 방안 연구” has been accepted in KIECS 2024.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 04] Congratulations! Jong-Bin’s paper, “A Similarity-based Training Strategy with Network-level Perturbation for Semi-supervised Semantic Segmentation,” has been accepted in ICPRAI 2024.
entry.summary: [2024. 04] Congratulations! Jong-Bin’s paper, “A Similarity-based Training Strategy with Network-level Perturbation for Semi-supervised Semantic Segmentation,” has been accepted in ICPRAI 2024.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2024. 04] Congratulations! Young-Han’s paper, “공공기관 구내식당 식수 예측 모델개발 및 변수 선정 연구,” KIISE Transactions on Computing and Practices (KCI)

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “A Constrained Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm with Clustering based Weight Vector Adaptation,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.0, Top 5.9%).
entry.summary: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “A Constrained Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm with Clustering based Weight Vector Adaptation,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.0, Top 5.9%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper “RSSGLT: Remote Sensing Image Segmentation Network based on Global-Local Transformer” has been accepted in IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (SCI, JCR-IF: 4.8, Top 10.9%)
entry.summary: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper “RSSGLT: Remote Sensing Image Segmentation Network based on Global-Local Transformer” has been accepted in IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (SCI, JCR-IF: 4.8, Top 10.9%)
